nodes.documentation:
@title A non-fungible token expressing the EcoAlly
 @dev EcoAllyBase contains the base contract which holds structs, events, and base variables
nodes.name: EcoAllyBase

nodes.documentation: @dev Creation event is fired whenever a new Ally comes into creation
nodes.name: Creation

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfer event as defined in ERC721 spec. Emitted every time an Ally ownership is assigned, including creation
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation: @dev Assign ownership of a specific EcoAlly to a new address
nodes.name: _transfer

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct EcoAllyBase.EcoAlly storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: _createEcoAlly
